definition: to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: This research provides a guide to the fabrication of practical FRAs.
sentences.chinese: 我們的研究對實際製作光纖拉曼放大器提供了指導。

sentences.english: I set up an experimental 801 amplifier.
sentences.chinese: 我建立了一個實驗性的801放大器。

sentences.english: Amplifier self-oscillates at a frequency depending on the velocity of the fluid.
sentences.chinese: 放大器自激振盪的頻率就取決於流體的速度。

sentences.english: JJM : There are very interesting things about amplification.
sentences.chinese: 放大器方面有很多有趣的東西。

sentences.english: Model LCV is part of the connecting cable of the force transmitter.
sentences.chinese: LCV型放大器是力傳遞裝置連接電纜的一部分。

sentences.english: Does anyone have the exact schematic for the J2 amplifier?
sentences.chinese: 誰是否有J2放大器的確切的概要？

sentences.english: Single Supply, Low-Power, High Output, Current Feedback Amplifier.
sentences.chinese: 單電源，低功耗，高輸出電流反饋放大器。

sentences.english: There are only three different amplifier series service by EKSC Eagle.
sentences.chinese: 只有三種不同的放大器，EKSC鷹系列服務。

sentences.english: Very High-Speed, Low-Cost, Quad Operational Amplifier.
sentences.chinese: 極高速，低成本，四路運算放大器。

sentences.english: Dual, Wideband, High Output Current, Operational Amplifier with Current Limit.
sentences.chinese: 雙路，寬帶，高輸出電流運算放大器的電流限制。

sentences.english: Localise the ground connection for the amplifier.
sentences.chinese: 定位放大器的接地連接。

sentences.english: A low-voltage and high speed CMOS fully differential operational amplifier is designed.
sentences.chinese: 設計了一種低壓高速CMOS全差分運算放大器。

sentences.english: The effects of several factors on the gain spectrum of a Raman fiber amplifier (RFA) are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了影響拉曼光纖放大器增益譜的幾個因素。

sentences.english: A quad amplifier contains four identical circuit units.
sentences.chinese: 一臺四元組放大器包含四個恆等電路單元。

sentences.english: An application example of the constant-current power amplifier is described in brief.
sentences.chinese: 簡單介紹了恆流功率放大器在實際電路系統中的應用。

definition: filtering radio waves (i.e. to pick out one frequency)
